text: Andreas Klausen Helmersen (born 15 March 1998) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a striker for Rosenborg. ==Career== After impressing during preseason Andreas Helmersen was promoted to the first team ahead of the 2015 Tippeligaen season. Andreas Helmersen made his debut for Rosenborg starting in a 3-0 win in a cup game against Vuku in April 2015. On July 2 the same year he made his European debut coming on in a 2-0 win in the first qualifying round of the 2015–16 UEFA Europa League over Víkingur of the Faroe Islands. In November 2015 Helmersen, alongside teammates John Hou Sæter and Sivert Solli, became the first players in Norwegian football history to having won the Under-16, Under-19 and the senior Norwegian Football Cup. Helmersen and Sæter having also won the Under-16 cup twice. Helmersen won the Under-16 Cup in 2013 and 2014 and then the Under-19 and the senior cup in 2015. Helmersen scored in both the Under-16 finals. In February 2018, Helmersen signed a new three-year contract with Rosenborg.http://www.rbk.no/nyheter/ny-treaarskontrakt-for- helmersen A few days later he went out on loan to Ranheim.http://www.rbk.no/nyheter/helmersen-lanes-ut-til-ranheim ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |2015 |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Rosenborg |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |0||0||3||0||3||0||6||0 |- |2016 |0||0||2||0||0||0||2||0 |- |2017 | rowspan="3"|Eliteserien |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- |2018 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Ranheim |23||3||2||1||0||0||25||4 |- |2019 |rowspan="1"|Odd |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total !24!!3!!7!!1!!3!!0!!34!!4 |} ==Honours== ===Club=== ; Rosenborg *Norwegian Premier League (1): 2017 *Norwegian Football Cup (2): 2015, 2016 *Norwegian U-19 Championship (1): 2015https://www.fotball.no/fotballdata/kamp/?fiksId=6377632 *Norwegian U-16 Championship (2): 2013, 2014 ==References== ==External links== * Andreas Helmersen at NFF * Andreas Helmersen at Odds BK Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Rosenborg BK players Category:Ranheim Fotball players Category:Odds BK players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Association football midfielders
